title: patch launcher fails to start game
body:
reinstalled league and was working fine but the next day when i got back on league wouldn't start it would open the patcher but after i pressed launch it would exit the patcher and do nothing. it does say that league is running as a background app still but does not open.

if this could be solved quickly that would be great

replies.body: It seems that something is blocking the patcher from launching, so it's kind of just in a dormant state.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure that access to the patcher is allowed so it can open and scan files.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards.
